aboutMe:
My name is Kent and I am a graduate from the University of California, Riverside with a B.S. in Computer Science. I am currently looking for opportunies in the tech industry. 

 I am a full stack developer with experience in C++, C#, Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML, CSS, and SQL. I am also familiar with React, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, PostrgreSQL, and AWS. I am a quick learner and I am always looking to learn new things.
